select bill.fid as id,bill.FNUMBER as num,bill.FNAME as title, bill.FBOOKEDDATE as bizDate,bill.FSTATE as state, bill.FCONTRACTTYPEID as contractTypeId,ct.FNAME_L2 as contractTypeName, bill.FProgrammingContract as programContractId,pc.FNAME_L2 as programContractName, bill.FCURRENCYID as currencyId,cur.FNAME_L2 as currencyName, bill.FAMOUNT as amount,bill.FORIGINALAMOUNT as oriAmount, sup.FNAME_L2 as receiverName,bill.FSIGNDATE as signDate, u.FNAME_L2 as creatorName,bill.FCREATETIME as createTime, bill.FPERSONID as personId,p.FNAME_L2 as personName from T_CON_CONTRACTWITHOUTTEXT bill left join T_FDC_ContractType ct on ct.fid=bill.FCONTRACTTYPEID left join T_CON_ProgrammingContract pc on pc.fid=bill.FProgrammingContract left join T_BD_CURRENCY cur on cur.fid=bill.FCURRENCYID left join t_bd_supplier sup on sup.fid=bill.FRECEIVEUNITID left join T_PM_USER u on u.fid=bill.FCREATORID left join T_BD_Person p on p.fid=bill.FPERSONID
and bill.FControlUnitID=#{orgId}
and bill.FCurProjectID in
#{item}
and bill.FBOOKEDDATE like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{bizDate}),'%')
and bill.fnumber like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{num}),'%')
and bill.fname like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{title}),'%')
and ct.FNAME_L2 like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{contractTypeName}),'%')
and sup.FNAME_L2 like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{receiverName}),'%') or p.FNAME_L2 like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{receiverName}),'%')
and bill.FAMOUNT like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{amount}),'%')
and bill.FORIGINALAMOUNT like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{oriAmount}),'%')
and bill.fstate like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{state},'%'))
order by bill.FBOOKEDDATE desc,bill.fnumber

select bill.fid as id,bill.FNUMBER as num,bill.FNAME as title,bill.FBOOKEDDATE as bizDate,bill.FSTATE as state, bill.FCONTRACTTYPEID as contractTypeId,ct.FNAME_L2 as contractTypeName,bill.FLXNUMID as unionBankId, bill.FProgrammingContract as programContractId,pc.FNAME_L2 as programContractName, bill.FCURRENCYID as currencyId,cur.FNAME_L2 as currencyName,bill.FAMOUNT as amount,bill.FORIGINALAMOUNT as oriAmount, sup.FNAME_L2 as receiverName,bill.FSIGNDATE as signDate,u.FNAME_L2 as creatorName,bill.FCREATETIME as createTime, bill.FAUDITTIME as auditTime,bill.FAUDITORID as auditorId,u1.FNAME_L2 as auditorName, bill.FPERSONID as personId,p.FNAME_L2 as personName,unit.FNAME_L2 as orgName,pro.FNAME_L2 as projectName, pbt.FNAME_L2 as payBillTypeName,bill.FCONTROLUNITID as orgId,pct.FNAME_L2 as payContentName,bill.FPERIODID as periodId, per.FPERIODYEAR as periodYear,per.FPERIODNUMBER as periodNumber,bill.FTAXERQUA as taxerQua,bill.FTAXERNUM as taxerNumber, bank.fnumber as unionBankNum,bill.FBANKACCT as bankAccount,bill.bank as bank,bill.FSETTLEMENTTYPEID as settlementTypeId, st.FNAME_L2 as settlementTypeName,bill.FApplierId as applierId,p1.FNAME_L2 as applierName,bill.FUseDepartmentID as useDeptId, org.FNAME_L2 as useDeptName,bill.FCostedDeptId as costDeptId,bill.FCOSTEDCOMPANYID as costCompanyId, cc.FNAME_L2 as costDeptName,cp.FNAME_L2 as costCompanyName,bill.FMarketProjectId as marketProjectId, mar.FNAME as marketProjectName,cost.FNAME_L2 as costAccountName,bill.FMpCostAccountId as costAccountId, bill.FInvoiceAmt as invoiceAMT,bill.FRATEAMOUNT as rateAmount,bill.FDESCRIPTION as description from T_CON_CONTRACTWITHOUTTEXT bill left join T_FDC_ContractType ct on ct.fid=bill.FCONTRACTTYPEID left join T_FDC_CostAccount cost on cost.fid=bill.FMPCOSTACCOUNTID left join T_CON_ProgrammingContract pc on pc.fid=bill.FProgrammingContract left join T_BD_CURRENCY cur on cur.fid=bill.FCURRENCYID left join t_bd_supplier sup on sup.fid=bill.FRECEIVEUNITID left join T_PM_USER u on u.fid=bill.FCREATORID left join T_PM_User u1 on u1.fid=bill.FAUDITORID left join T_BD_Person p on p.fid=bill.FPERSONID left join T_BD_Person p1 on p1.fid=bill.FPERSONID left join T_ORG_CTRLUNIT unit on unit.fid=bill.FControlUnitID left join T_FDC_CurProject pro on pro.fid=bill.FCURPROJECTID left join T_CAS_PaymentBillType pbt on pbt.fid=bill.FPAYBILLTYPEID left join T_CON_PayContentType pct on pct.fid=bill.FPAYCONTENTTYPEID left join T_BD_Period per on per.fid = bill.FPERIODID left join T_CON_BankNum bank on bank.fid = bill.FLXNUMID left join T_BD_SettlementType st on st.fid=bill.FSETTLEMENTTYPEID left join T_ORG_Admin org on org.fid=bill.FUseDepartmentID left join T_ORG_CostCenter cc on cc.fid=bill.FCOSTEDDEPTID left join T_ORG_Company cp on cp.fid=bill.FCOSTEDCOMPANYID left join T_CON_MarketProject mar on mar.fid=bill.FMARKETPROJECTID where bill.fid=#{id}
